exec.name: Jonathan Heidegger
exec.description: Presides at all meetings of the chapter, is a member ex officio of all chapter committees, and serves as the designated official representative of the chapter.

exec.name: Ethan Brooks
exec.description: Maintains copies of chapter Bylaws and Active Requirements. Assists the President with any miscellaneous tasks. Manages the values chairs and oversees projects and provides assistance as well as serves as a liaison between chairs and exec.

exec.name: Jordan Domasky
exec.description: Oversees Growth Chairs and the recruitment process, ensuring there are at least three recruitment events as well as a freshman mixer during band camp. Organizes the interview process and helps chair discussions. Leads membership candidates through the road to wisdom to understand our values and fraternity as a whole.

exec.name: Ashley Kikos
exec.description: Creates a chapter budget for the fall and spring semester, keeps a constant communication with the Student Activities and Organizations (SAO) and Business Office for Student Organizations (BOSO), monitors chapter expenses and incomes, and aids the Fundraising Chair(s) with any assistance they may need.

exec.name: Maxwell Smith
exec.description: Maintains the systems necessary to help the chapter run smoothly. Keeps the google drive organized, creates and maintains agendas for chapter and exec meetings, updates the chapter calendar with KKY events, assists with the tracking of active requirements and chapter attendance, and coordinates the chapter slack.

exec.name: Jack Filpi
exec.description: Maintains the files and artifacts of history of the chapter and documenting events and projects created by the chapter.

exec.name: Kayla Denklau
exec.description: Corresponds with alumni through periodic publications, maintains accurate records of alumni members, and assists graduating Brothers on their road to Alumni status.

name: Jacob Descoteau
Matthew Heath
chairs.description: Correspond with alumni through periodic publications, maintain accurate records of alumni members, and assist graduating Brothers on their road to Alumni status.

name: Ashley Brazeau
Jackson Moss
chairs.description: Organizes events and activities for active chapter, plans joint activities with Tau Beta Sigma, organizes activities with other chapters, and plans all chapter social functions.

name: Catie Gilhooly
Annabelle Johnson
chairs.description: Responsible for promoting musicianship throughout chapter and for the maintenance of music share project.

name: Gianna Marzen
chairs.description: Maintains ritual equipment and keeps detailed inventory, sands and paints the senior boards for any graduating seniors, and organizes the bandinage.

name: Nathan Greenland
Josh McAtee
chairs.description: Plans all chapter recruitment functions and pre-selections activities, organizes Big Brother selection and program, develops membership activities for active members, and assists VPM with Membership Education Activities as needed.

name: Swoosh
Geoffrey Ladue
chairs.description: Plans and advises chapter on all fundraising events, organizes the selling of all merchandise and fundraising items, investigates new merchandise, fundraising projects and other ideas as needed, and offers new ideas and events for consideration.

name: Emily Horst
Eric Hacker
chairs.description: Responsible for communicating with the public and university with what is going on in our fraternity and department and responsible for advertising recruitment materials.

name: Luke Wagner
chairs.description: Responsible for all things computer related with respect to the chapter, including the chapter website and additional computerized record keeping for the chapter.
